refnamediv.refpurpose: Closes graphic figures, progression or wait bars, the help browser, xcos, the variables browser or editor.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: close close(H) close help close xcos close xcos! close editvar close browsevar

listitem.para: Vector of graphic figures handles or ids, or of handles of progression bar or wait bar.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: close closes the current graphic figure (if any).
close(H) closes the figures, waitbar or progression bars whose handles or indices are in H.
close help closes the help browser.
close browsevar closes the variable browser.
close editvar closes the variable editor (it must not be docked).
close xcos closes all opened xcos windows. If some diagrams have unsaved changes, the user is asked for confirmation.
close xcos! forces closing all opened xcos windows without asking for any confirmation.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // You are reading this example in the help browser. Now, bye: close help
a = rand(3,5); editvar a sleep(5000) close editvar

itemizedlist.listitem: Vector of several figures ids now accepted.
Extension to close help, close xcos, close xcos!, close browsevar, and close editvar
